intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite city to visit?
Do you prefer tea or coffee?
What is your favorite family recipe?
Where do you go to school?

respond_situations.description: You see a shirt in a store.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café with a menu.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to buy?

ask_situations.instruction: You are at a store. Ask the clerk for the price of a toy.
You want to ask a classmate for help. ..
You are at school. Ask a friend for help with homework.

listening_script.text: I play with my toys. My toys are fun. I have a car and a doll. I play every day. I share toys with my friends.

questions.question: Who do you share toys with?

follow_up_questions.question: What do you wear in summer?
When do you wear your summer clothes?
Where do you buy your summer clothes?
How do you feel in your summer clothes?
